Package killdrluckygame

Interface Space

All Known Implementing Classes:
DrLuckySpace
public interface Space
This represents the space in the world. It has space name,position co-ordinates, neighbors and weapon names.

  • Method Summary

    Method
    Description
    boolean
    addItemToSpace(Item item)

    • addItemToSpace

      boolean addItemToSpace(Item item)
      Returns true if the item was added successfully to the list of items for that space. returns false if the item was not added successfully.
      Parameters:
      item - item to be added in the space.
      Returns:
      boolean value indicating if the item was added in the room or not.

    • removeItemFromSpace

      boolean removeItemFromSpace(Item item)
      This method removes the item from the space.
      Parameters:
      item - the item to be removed.
      Returns:
      returns true or false depending on the situation.
